Articles.Content:
I just started making my first mod and i like to copyright it befare upload it here, so can someone post tutorial and link how and where get copyright addons. Thanks.

Edit: i found out license think. Thanks for help.

Edited May 2, 2015 by SolidJuho

Hi SolidJuho, your work is automatically protected by copyright law, but will require a license to be with the work and on the forum thread if you post your work here.

You can choose any license you like, so if you don't want others redistributing it or using parts from it you can use "All rights reserved", or you can be permissive with a license that allows others to reuse and even monetize your work, or anything in between.
Do i have to go to somekind website to get license?

Do i have to go to somekind website to get license?

No just choose one from this list here and include a notice of it in your thread and your eventual zip file.
